@description.name: @description
@description.body: The TextField is a multi-line text input field.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: value {String?""} The text area's initial value
@param.description: The text area's initial value

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Controls whether text wrap is activated or not.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: overridden

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Factor for scrolling the TextArea with the mouse wheel.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Minimal line height. On default this is set to four lines.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Whether the TextArea should automatically adjust to the height of the content. To set the initial height, modify {@link #minHeight}. If you wish to set a minHeight below four lines of text, also set {@link #minimalLineHeight}. In order to limit growing to a certain height, set {@link #maxHeight} respectively. Please note that autoSize is ignored when the {@link #height} property is in use.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: overridden

@param.name: @param
@param.body: value {String} The new value
@param.description: The new value

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Handles the roll for scrolling the TextArea.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: e {qx.event.type.Roll} roll event.
@param.description: roll event.

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
When the element resizes we throw away the clone and trigger autosize again, otherwise the clone would have
another width and the autosize calculation would be faulty.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: e {qx.event.type.Data} resize event.
@param.description: resize event.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Adjust height of TextArea so that content fits without scroll bar.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Get actual height of TextArea

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Set actual height of TextArea

@param.name: @param
@param.body: height {Integer} Desired height of TextArea
@param.description: Desired height of TextArea

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Get scrolled area height. Equals the total height of the TextArea, as if no scroll-bar was visible.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the area clone.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Element|null} DOM Element or null if there is no original element
@return.desc: DOM Element or null if there is no original element

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Creates and prepares the area clone.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Scroll TextArea to bottom. That way, scrollTop reflects the height of the TextArea.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: clone {Element} The TextArea to scroll
@param.description: The TextArea to scroll

@description.name: @description
@description.body: overridden

@description.name: @description
@description.body: property apply

@description.name: @description
@description.body: property apply

@description.name: @description
@description.body: property apply

@description.name: @description
@description.body: property apply

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Force rewrapping of text.

The distribution of characters depends on the space available.
Unfortunately, browsers do not reliably (or not at all) rewrap text when
the size of the text area changes.

This method is called on change of the area's size.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Warn when both autoSize and height property are set.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: overridden

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Translate a message
Mark the message for translation.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: messageId {String} message id (may contain format strings)
@param.description: message id (may contain format strings)

@param.name: @param
@param.body: varargs {Object} variable number of arguments applied to the format string
@param.description: variable number of arguments applied to the format string

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String | LocalizedString} The translated message or localized string
@return.desc: The translated message or localized string

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Translate a plural message
Mark the messages for translation.

Depending on the third argument the plural or the singular form is chosen.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: singularMessageId {String} message id of the singular form (may contain format strings)
@param.description: message id of the singular form (may contain format strings)

@param.name: @param
@param.body: pluralMessageId {String} message id of the plural form (may contain format strings)
@param.description: message id of the plural form (may contain format strings)

@param.name: @param
@param.body: count {Integer} if greater than 1 the plural form otherwise the singular form is returned.
@param.description: if greater than 1 the plural form otherwise the singular form is returned.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: varargs {Object} variable number of arguments applied to the format string
@param.description: variable number of arguments applied to the format string

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String | LocalizedString} The translated message or localized string
@return.desc: The translated message or localized string

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Translate a message with translation hint
Mark the messages for translation.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: hint {String} hint for the translator of the message. Will be included in the .po file.
@param.description: hint for the translator of the message. Will be included in the .po file.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: messageId {String} message id (may contain format strings)
@param.description: message id (may contain format strings)

@param.name: @param
@param.body: varargs {Object} variable number of arguments applied to the format string
@param.description: variable number of arguments applied to the format string

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String | LocalizedString} The translated message or localized string
@return.desc: The translated message or localized string

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Translate a plural message with translation hint
Mark the messages for translation.

Depending on the third argument the plural or the singular form is chosen.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: hint {String} hint for the translator of the message. Will be included in the .po file.
@param.description: hint for the translator of the message. Will be included in the .po file.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: singularMessageId {String} message id of the singular form (may contain format strings)
@param.description: message id of the singular form (may contain format strings)

@param.name: @param
@param.body: pluralMessageId {String} message id of the plural form (may contain format strings)
@param.description: message id of the plural form (may contain format strings)

@param.name: @param
@param.body: count {Integer} if greater than 1 the plural form otherwise the singular form is returned.
@param.description: if greater than 1 the plural form otherwise the singular form is returned.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: varargs {Object} variable number of arguments applied to the format string
@param.description: variable number of arguments applied to the format string

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String | LocalizedString} The translated message or localized string
@return.desc: The translated message or localized string

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Mark the message for translation but return the original message.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: messageId {String} the message ID
@param.description: the message ID
